welcome.title: Welcome to WhiteoutSurvival SvS!

verification.tutorial_description: Follow these steps to locate your Game ID:

setup.complete_description: You now have access to the server. Your personal channel will remain available for private commands.

privacy.title: üîí Privacy & Data Management
privacy.description: Manage your personal data stored by this bot
privacy.delete_warning:
This will permanently delete all your data from our systems. This action cannot be undone!

**What will be deleted:**
‚Ä¢ Your verification status
‚Ä¢ Alliance membership
‚Ä¢ Event history
‚Ä¢ Language preferences
‚Ä¢ All associated records

**Note:** You will need to verify again to use the bot.
privacy.deletion_complete: ‚úÖ Your data has been permanently deleted from our systems.
privacy.no_data: ‚ÑπÔ∏è No data found for your account.
privacy.policy_description: Review our privacy policy and terms of service:
privacy.retention_info: Your data is retained while you actively use the bot. Inactive accounts are automatically cleaned after 90 days.
privacy.rights_info: You have the right to access, correct, export, or delete your personal data at any time using this command.
